headline: This Legendary Investor Just Made a Huge Bet on This One Stock -- Should You Follow?
summary: Famed investor Michael Burry became bearish on the stock market in Q1, but he doubled down on his position in Estee Lauder.  The beauty company has struggled due to a sluggish recovery from Chinese consumers, especially in the retail travel market.  Legendary investor Michael Burry is known for making big bets.
